Class LoggingSignInManager

Namespace
Project.Api.Auth
Assembly
Project.Api.dll

Custom implementation of SignInManager<TUser> that adds logging capabilities for user sign-in events.

public class LoggingSignInManager : SignInManager<User>

LoggingSignInManager(UserManager<User>, IHttpContextAccessor, IUserClaimsPrincipalFactory<User>, IOptions<IdentityOptions>, ILogger<SignInManager<User>>, IAuthenticationSchemeProvider, IUserConfirmation<User>, IUserLoggerService)

Initializes a new instance of the LoggingSignInManager class.

public LoggingSignInManager(UserManager<User> userManager, IHttpContextAccessor contextAccessor, IUserClaimsPrincipalFactory<User> claimsFactory, IOptions<IdentityOptions> optionsAccessor, ILogger<SignInManager<User>> logger, IAuthenticationSchemeProvider schemes, IUserConfirmation<User> confirmation, IUserLoggerService userLoggerService)

Parameters

userManager UserManager<User>

The user manager used to manage user accounts.

contextAccessor IHttpContextAccessor

Provides access to the current HTTP context.

claimsFactory IUserClaimsPrincipalFactory<User>

Factory to create claims principals for users.

optionsAccessor IOptions<IdentityOptions>

Provides access to identity options.

logger ILogger<SignInManager<User>>

The logger used for logging user operations.

schemes IAuthenticationSchemeProvider

Authentication scheme provider.

confirmation IUserConfirmation<User>

User confirmation service.

userLoggerService IUserLoggerService

Custom user logging service for tracking sign-in events.

Methods

CheckPasswordSignInAsync(User, string, bool)

Checks if the specified password is valid for the given user and logs the login event if successful.

public override Task<SignInResult> CheckPasswordSignInAsync(User user, string password, bool lockoutOnFailure)

Parameters

user User

The user whose password is being checked.

password string

The password to validate.

lockoutOnFailure bool

Whether to lock the user out on failure.

Returns

Task<SignInResult>

A SignInResult indicating the result of the password validation.

Exceptions

Exception

Thrown when the user email is invalid or null.
